State map macros

Theses macros are used to define the state map of the state machine.

#define BEGIN_STATE_MAP
#define END_STATE_MAP
#define STATE_MAP_ENTRY(entry)   { (StateFunc)(entry) },

#define LOCK_STATE_MACHINE   SemObtainer state_machine_so(&GetSempahore());
 

Macro used to lock state machine operations and data accesses. Using this macro at the beginning of a method ensures the method to be atomic.

#define STATE_MAP_ENTRY (  entry   )     { (StateFunc)(entry) },
 

Adds an entry to the state map.

Adds an entry to a transition map.
